system.description:
Time: 15-RSI secondsRitual: Silent Prayer
Range: TouchDuration: One Touch

Inflicts a severe jolt of pain on the next person or creature touched by the invoker, requiring an immediate Shock Roll:

CS 6d6 Shock Roll
MS 3d6 Shock Roll
MF No effect, although the victim feels some pain and will likely take exception to the deed.
CF Invoker makes a 5d6 Shock Roll.

The invocation may be added to a whip. This extends “touch” to the range of the whip, but requires a strike to be effective. The impact of the whip is a separate injury.
